item.description:
Baci Grill specializes in creative, chef-inspired cuisine. Our focus is on unique pastas, appetizers, entrees and salads complemented by a well rounded wine list full of regional variety. Baci Grill offers banquet services for bridal showers, weddings, reception dinners, baby showers, birthday and anniversary celebrations, business and special events in our private banquet rooms.

We are located at 134 Berlin Road in Cromwell, Connecticut. Come experience the fine dining Baci Grill has to offer  COME JOIN IN ON THE FUN!!!!!!!!!!
item.how_to_find_us: warm welcome from Terri and Chuck 860-729-4504

group.name: Eat, Laugh, and Be Merry in West Hartford
